metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Stream Delivery | Streaming Video CDN
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Stream Delivery leverages our global Anycast network for high-quality video streaming with minimal buffering. Learn more about our CDN streaming service.

buttonModal.title: Talk to an expert
buttonModal.regularCopy: See how the connectivity cloud can work for you.

relatedBlades.title: Deliver seamless video content with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Get video caching and delivery with predictable pricing
relatedBlades.copy: Ensure fast and reliable video delivery, with shorter video startup times and reduced buffering — no matter where your visitors are located.

columnContent.title: Fast delivery
columnContent.description: Our content delivery network (CDN) spans %{DataCenterCount} cities across %{CountryCount} countries, including %{ChinaDataCenterCount} in [China](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/china-network/), so you can deliver high-quality video content at global scale.

columnContent.title: Reliable, flat-rate pricing
columnContent.description: Cache videos to save on origin server bandwidth costs and enjoy predictable pricing, even in the case of legitimate traffic spikes and volumetric DDoS attacks.

columnContent.title: Reduced data egress costs
columnContent.description: Customers hosting websites with Cloudflare Bandwidth Alliance partners can decrease or eliminate data egress costs from their hosting provider to Cloudflare when dynamic content is requested.

relatedBlades.title: Minimize latency and deliver consistent, high-quality video experiences
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare caches and delivers HTTP(S) video content, including adaptive bitrate formats, to give your visitors a seamless experience.

imageAssetFile.altText: Stream Delivery - How it works - image
imageAssetFile.title: Stream Delivery - How it works - image

contentfulAsset.description: Stream Delivery - How it works - Diagram

columnContent.title: Enhance video quality
columnContent.description: Improve visitor engagement with high-quality online video experiences, regardless of device, connection type, or location.

columnContent.title: Ensure video uptime
columnContent.description: Ensure the continuous availability of video content with DDoS protection (with %{NetworkCapacity} Tbps of network capacity), our web application firewall (WAF), and rate limiting services.

columnContent.title: Purge cache instantly
columnContent.description: Selectively purge videos from Cloudflare's entire network cache within seconds.

columnContent.title: Encrypt files automatically
columnContent.description: Automatically encrypt all files proxied through the Cloudflare network to prevent snooping.

relatedBlades.mainHeadline: Caliente.mx uses Cloudflare to improve real-time video streaming at scale

content.value: Caliente.mx needed to provide users with the best-possible live-action betting and sports viewing experience, but faced latency hurdles across their global userbase.

With Cloudflare Stream Delivery, Caliente.mx is able to ensure the highest throughput and lowest possible latency across their entire customer base, so their users never receive outdated information or experience lagging video performance.
We didn't want to compromise — we wanted a single solution to provide our users with the safest, most responsive gaming experience possible. Cloudflare offered everything we needed.

relatedBlades.title: Streamline and speed up your video delivery

buttonOne.elementName: Stream Delivery - Enablement blade - Streamline and speed up your video delivery - CTA

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud simplifies and streamlines video infrastructure, delivery, and performance
relatedBlades.description: The connectivity cloud — a unified platform of cloud-native services — helps organizations achieve optimal site performance and security at scale:

columnContent.title: Composable architecture
columnContent.description: Meet any use case with full API programmability and location-customizable logging, routing, caching, and decryption.

columnContent.title: Integration
columnContent.description: Preserve user experiences with single-pass inspection and a network that's %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent} of Internet users.

columnContent.title: Threat intelligence
columnContent.description: Block more threats — known and unknown — with intelligence gleaned from blocking %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats.

columnContent.title: Unified interface
columnContent.description: Reduce tool sprawl and alert fatigue by uniting hybrid work security services in one UI.

features.title: Cloudflare Stream for seamless video delivery
features.description: Learn how to build your own video features, upload user-generated content, stream live video, and more.
